entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:27 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
